SEARCH

Class UserControllerTest

java.lang.Object
UserControllerTest
class UserControllerTest extends Object
Comprehensive JUnit Test suite for the UserController class.

This suite utilizes Reflection to mock UI components and manipulate private fields, ensuring high code coverage and isolating the test environment from external dependencies such as the email system.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Zainab

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • initJfxAndEnv

      @BeforeAll static void initJfxAndEnv()
      Initializes the JavaFX Toolkit once before all tests execution.

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp() throws Exception
      Sets up the test environment before each test execution. Creates dummy data, initializes the controller, injects mock UI components, and detaches the real email system to prevent CI/CD failures.
      Throws:
      Exception - If initialization fails.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown()
      Cleans up resources after each test by deleting the temporary data file.

    • disableEmailNotifications

      private void disableEmailNotifications()
      Uses reflection to detach the email subscriber from the OverduePublisher. This prevents the application from attempting to send real emails during testing.

    • createDummyFile

      private void createDummyFile() throws IOException
      Creates a temporary CSV file with varied media data for testing purposes.
      Throws:
      IOException - If writing to the file fails.

    • injectMockUI

      private void injectMockUI() throws Exception
      Injects JavaFX controls into the controller using Reflection.
      Throws:
      Exception - If field access fails.

    • runOnFxThreadAndWait

      private void runOnFxThreadAndWait(Runnable action)
      Executes a Runnable on the JavaFX Application Thread and waits for completion.
      Parameters:
      action - The code to execute.

      Verifies that the table is populated with data upon initialization.

    • injectField

      private void injectField(Object target, String fieldName, Object value) throws Exception
      Helper to inject mock objects into the controller.
      Parameters:
      target - The controller instance.
      fieldName - The name of the field to inject.
      value - The value to set.
      Throws:
      Exception - If reflection fails.
